text: Balo -- ''eso ami batale di'i tomadera prabhu tomadera jan'ya ki nisedha karechena, -- tomara tamra sange an'ya kichu sarika karo na, ara pita-matara prati sadbyabahara, ara tomadera santanadera tomara hatya karo na daridrera karane,â€™â€™ -- amara'i jibika di'i tomadera o tadera'o, -- ''ara aslilatara dhare-kache'o ye'o na tara ya prakasa paya o ya gopana thake, ara temana kono lokake hatya karo na yake allah nisedha karechena, -- yathayatha karana byatita. E'isaba diye tini tomadera adesa jari karechena, yena tomara bujhate paro.
